rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: Spacious lobby with wheelchair accessible ramp and minimalistic design. Entryway leading to living areas.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area combined with dining space, designed for comfortable seating and entertainment. Includes a modern fireplace.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern open-plan kitchen integrated into the living area with accessible layout, pull-out countertops and lower cabinetry for wheelchair accessibility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 1 (Master Bedroom)
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with ample storage and en-suite bathroom. Positioned in the North-West for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom designed for comfort and functionality with storage space. Positioned in the West for stability.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom to serve as guest or work area; also can be adapted as a study. Located in the South-West.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring space for family members or extra functionality; oriented towards the North for positive energy.

rooms.name: Bedroom 5
rooms.description: Final bedroom designed to be multi-functional (study or workspace) with accessibility features. Oriented in the East for creativity.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: Entertainment zone equipped with soundproofing and adjustable seating arrangements. Positioned to minimize exterior noise disturbances.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Dedicated gym area with space for various equipment and ample storage; designed with accessibility in mind.

rooms.name: Bathroom Suite
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom suite adjacent to master bedroom with grab bars and low threshold entries.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible door with automatic opener system.
Provides natural light and connects indoor and outdoor living spaces.
Energy efficient windows placed to maximize daylight and maintain privacy.
